name: Coffee Club Seminar Information Session (US Field)
description: Coffee Club, Seminar, or Information Session Speaking Engagement Submissions
helpText:
»Important: Approval is required before sending invitations and the event taking place.

Request to obtain Compliance approval for a speaking engagement/seminar event.
  • To determine whether Speaking Engagement Approval is required or to read the instructions for completing the form, review Obtaining Compliance Approval for Marketing Events.
  • See Seminars: Frequently Asked Questions for more information.
  • Allow a minimum of 5 business days from the time your request is submitted for your request to be reviewed. This does not guarantee approval will be provided.
»Are you or your team presenting with any other Financial Advisors?
  • If so, then ensure all presenters at Edward Jones are included within the On Behalf Of field so they can see this submission for their record.

name: Public Appearance (US Home Office)
description: Request to obtain approval for an interview with a TV, Radio, Newspaper, Podcast, Magazine outlet or to participate in a panel discussion.
helpText:
»The standard review time is 5 business days and approval is not guaranteed.  Plan accordingly when submitting items for review.

»Approval is not guaranteed.
 
»The Interview Request form is for requesting approval to participate in a media interview or panel discussions.
  • Examples of media interviews include, but are not limited to a TV, Radio, Newspaper, Blog, Podcast, Magazine outlet interviews.
  • Example of a Panel Discussion includes being asked to be part of a group to discuss specific topics related to your area of business in front of an audience.
Public appearances where members of the media are likely to be present require approval from the Enterprise Comms Review.

Questions?
  • To contact Enterprise Comms Review with questions specific to Media Interviews and this form, email MediaHotline.
  • Already submitted items - send a Service Request to Compliance Communication Reviews and Education (CRE).
  • General policy and process questions - contact Compliance Service at #40.
